message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.HC 

The paper proposes a visualization system to improve the reviewer selection process in the academic domain. The system visualizes and explores a literature citation network to construct a set of relevant and pertinent papers. This suggests that the paper could belong to the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR) or Digital Libraries (cs.DL). Additionally, the system helps to select reviewers based on their careers and co-authorship relations, which could fall under the sub-categories of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) or Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). Finally, the paper's focus on academic publishing and peer review could also place it under the sub-category of Software Engineering (cs.SE).
